srl.rule
Class Rule

java.lang.Object
  srl.rule.Rule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Expr
public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Expr

Represents a rule. The rule object allows for creation modification and matching of rules

Field Detail

heads

public ListenableList<Head> heads
A list of the heads of the rules. That is everything before the ":-"

body

public ListenableList<TypeExpr> body
A list of the body elements of the rules. That is everything after the ":-"

public boolean matches(SrlDocument sentence)
Check if a sentence as a sequence of tokens

Parameters:
sentence - A tokenized string
Returns:

getMatch

public java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<Entity,SrlMatchRegion>> getMatch(SrlDocument sentence,
                                                                         boolean firstOnly)
Find the matches. This function matches multiple times and so a list of match results are returned in order of first matched element. This function returns where every entity matched, giving the result for each entity in the rule as an SrlMatchRegion object.

Parameters:
sentence - A tokenizer
firstOnly - Only look for the first match
Returns:
The list of matches.

getHeads

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHeads(SrlDocument sentence)
Match the rule and output on the heads. The output is given by replacing each head's variable by the region of the sentence matched

Parameters:
sentence - The sentence to match
Returns:
The matches
